subject: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor
description_text:
Hi,

I see that you have realy good product, but, real professionals really
hate, don't need that holes on pedals, so i suggest that you have pedals in
your offer without holes.

Again, thank you for your hard work and respekt for your product.

Thank you Bye.[image: 3-3_4d3bf9e4-a79e-4330-b211-c4106ecd5e39_without
holes.jpg]

conversations.body_text: Hi Mladen Krkalo,  Thank you for your feedback. We will discuss with our design team whether to release a version of the panel without holes.

Great, thank you, that is very smart and good decision from you.

I know that holes looks cool, but belive me, profesionals, real driver hate
holes.

Again thank you, you have a great product, so, keep a good work.

Bye.

čet, 5. lip 2025. u 09:32 service@simsonn.com
